demos.name: Aerospace
demos.description:
Model, integrate, and simulate aircraft, spacecraft, missile, and propulsion systems

The Aerospace Blockset provides models and utilities based on aerospace standards and common references to accelerate the development and integration of system and sub-system models for aircraft, spacecraft, missiles, satellites, weapons, and unmanned airborne vehicles (UAVs).

The Aerospace Blockset includes blocks that provide essential calculation components and representation models to aid in the verification and visualization of the entire system design. Using the Aerospace Blockset in Simulink, you can integrate all of the component systems in a single environment, allowing you to deploy, reuse, and share your models, shaving months off your design schedule.

The Aerospace Blockset is an intuitive tool, composed of Simulink® block libraries, for the rapid design, graphical simulation, and prototyping of aerospace systems. Aerospace Blockset models are constructed within the Simulink environment. You select blocks from the available libraries and interconnect them in various configurations using the mouse. You can visualize your simulation interactively or pass simulation results to MATLAB® for post-processing. In addition to the built-in blocks, you can incorporate C code, MATLAB functions, and M-files. You can use Real-Time Workshop® to generate ANSI standard C code directly from your model.

Full Product Description
